title: Air Force One (1997) Harrison Ford (Widescreen, MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118571/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118571/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Danish, English, Finnish, German, French, Hrvatski, Italian, Norwegian, Portugese, Spanish, Swedish. (Sorry, Dutch and Polish friends, your language was not on the DVD.)

I was surprised to see that most rips of this all-time classic have vanished here at PirateBay, and could find no quality widescreen rip with multisubs. So I made one.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.

Widescreen, DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x288, great stereo AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
